sourcesContent:
<template>
    <template v-if="productsList.length > 0">
        <catalog-item
        v-for = "product in productsList"
        :productData="product"
        :key="product.article"
        />
    </template>
    <template v-else class='text-center col-9 mt-5'>
        Нет товаров удовлетворяющих вашему запросу
    </template>
    <paginate
        v-model="page"
        :page-count="2"
        :page-range="3"
        :margin-pages="2"
        :click-handler="clickCallback"
        :prev-text="'Prev'"
        :next-text="'Next'"
        :container-class="'pagination'"
        :page-class="'page-item'"
    >
  </paginate>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: {
        productsList: {
            type: Object,
            default() {
                return {};
            },

        }
    },
    

    data() {
        return {
            isProductLoading: Boolean,
            page: 1,
            paginate_total: productsList.le

        }    
    },
   
}

</script>

<style scoped>


</style>
